channel.title: Diospyros Kaki on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Diospyros Kaki on funPlantGenes

item.title: DkBG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: c54486_91 Gene Symbol: DkBG1 Gene Name: β-Glucosidases 1 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the persimmon abscisic acid β-glucosidase gene (DkBG1) alters fruit ripening in transgenic tomato.

item.title: DkbZIP5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkbZIP5 Gene Name: putative basic leucine-zipper transcription factor5 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: Seasonal Abscisic Acid Signal and a Basic Leucine Zipper Transcription Factor, DkbZIP5, Regulate Proanthocyanidin Biosynthesis in Persimmon Fruit.

item.title: DkBZR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkBZR1 Gene Name: BRASSINAZOLE RESISTANT 1 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors DkBZR1/DkBZR2 regulate cell wall degradation genes and ethylene biosynthesis genes during persimmon fruit ripening.

item.title: DkBZR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkBZR2 Gene Name: BRASSINAZOLE RESISTANT 2 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors DkBZR1/DkBZR2 regulate cell wall degradation genes and ethylene biosynthesis genes during persimmon fruit ripening.

item.title: DkMYB14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMYB14 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMYB14 is a bifunctional transcription factor that regulates the accumulation of proanthocyanidin in persimmon fruit.

item.title: DkMyb2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMyb2 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor2 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMyb2 wound-induced transcription factor of persimmon (Diospyros kaki Thunb.

item.title: DkMyb4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMyb4 Gene Name: Myb transcription factor4 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMyb4 Is a Myb Transcription Factor Involved in Proanthocyanidin Biosynthesis in Persimmon Fruit.

item.title: DkNAC9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkNAC9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: High CO2/hypoxia-induced softening of persimmon fruit is modulated by DkERF8/16 and DkNAC9 complexes.
